item.title: Collection Now Accepting Community Submissions
item.description:
We're Opening Up!

The Classic Sci-Fi Books Collection is now accepting community submissions!

What We're Looking For:

  • Classic science fiction from the golden age (1950s-1970s)
  • Books converted to markdown format
  • Cover images in JPEG format
  • Author README files with biographical info
  • Public domain or properly licensed works

How to Submit:

  1. Format your book in markdown following our template
  2. Calculate SHA-1 and TLSH hashes of your files
  3. Submit via NOSTR to npub1qvr3x...
  4. Include file paths, hashes, and a description

All submissions require curator approval. See guides/contributing.md for full guidelines.

We're excited to grow this collection with your help!
